column4: Does anybody know whether wireless WPA supports out of the box in 6.06?
wpa is supported... but it's initiated differently than previous versions of the package
Kr)ntab: can I know what is the difference in WPA in 6.06?
the dapper's wpa package integrates its configuration from within ifupdown's /etc/network/inerfaces config
KrOntab: Do you know a link to find more details on this?
no nice links that I've been able to find
did you have it working before?
KrOntab: Hello ..Do you know a link to find more details on this?
can someone tell me where I can find the details for WPA in 6.06?
KrOntab: No I did not get your mesg. Pls post it again.
Can someone give me the link/URL to see how the WPA works in 6.06?
